metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25743 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: hw/ide/pci.c in QEMU before 5.1.1 can trigger a NULL pointer dereference because it lacks a pointer check before an ide_cancel_dma_sync call.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Sergej Schumilo, Cornelius Aschermann, Simon Wrner

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-06-09, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-06-09').
